Package it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.updates

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ModelUpdateVisitor
    An interface describing an object using the visitor pattern to handle model updates
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionCardUpdate
    An update sent to a player when an ActionCard changes.
    DrawnPowerupUpdate
    An update sent when a player draws a PowerupCard.
    DrawnWeaponUpdate
    An update sent when a player draws a WeaponCard.
    InitialUpdate
    A general update sent when a player connects to the server
    LeaderboardUpdate
    An update containing the leaderboard and the final scores of players sent once the match is over
    LobbyUpdate
    This update is sent in broadcast by the Lobby to notify the players who are waiting for a match to start.
    MatchOperationalStateUpdate
    An update sent when the MatchOperationalState changes
    MatchUpdate
    An update sent when the Match changes its status.
    ModelUpdate
    An abstract class representing an update coming from the model.
    PlayerBoardUpdate
    An update sent when a player gets hit, marked or killed.
    PlayerTurnUpdate
    An update containing the turn that is currently being played, sent when a new turn begins
    PlayerUpdate
    An update sent when a Player changes its status.
    SquareUpdate
    An update sent when a Square changes its status
    WeaponCardUpdate
    An update sent when a WeaponCard changes its status
